content: The list of users previously invited to {{productName}} or separate rooms will appear here. You will be able to invite these users for collaboration at any time.

comment.text: This translation key is used to display a message explaining that the list of previously invited users can be accessed and invited for collaboration in certain situations. It appears on an empty screen when no content is displayed, likely in a button or dialog context, such as in a settings or invitation section of the UI.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'or separate rooms' is not accurately translated. The Bulgarian translation implies 'or separate rooms' refers to the *rooms* themselves, not that the users were invited to separate rooms. The English implies users were invited to different rooms, but the Bulgarian reads like the rooms themselves are an alternative to invited users.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тук ще се появи списък с потребители, предишно поканени в {{productName}} или в отделни стаи. Ще можете да поканите тези потребители за сътрудничество по всяко време.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'или списък с потребители' is slightly awkward. While technically correct, it's not the most natural flow in Bulgarian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Тук ще се появи списък с потребители, които са били предишно поканени в {{productName}}, или отделни стаи.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase 'separate rooms' is translated as 'samostatných místností'. While technically correct, 'samostatných místností' feels slightly formal and less natural in this context. A more conversational and appropriate translation would be 'oddělených místností' or 'jiných místností'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Zde se zobrazí seznam uživatelů, kteří byli dříve pozváni do prostoru {{productName}} nebo do oddělených/jiných místností. Tyto uživatele budete moci kdykoli pozvat ke spolupráci.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ցանկացած ժամանակ կկարողանաք" is a bit awkward and overly formal. A more natural phrasing for "at any time" would be "ցանկալսած պահին" or a simpler "ցանկացած պահի" .
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Այստեղ կհայտնվի նախկինում {{productName}} կամ առանձին սենյակներ հրավիրված օգտատերերի ցանկը: Դուք ցանկալսած պահին կկարողանաք հրավիրել այս օգտատերերին համագործակցության:

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "oa stanze separate" is grammatically incorrect and doesn't accurately translate "or separate rooms".  It should be "o stanze separate" or preferably rephrased for better flow and clarity in Italian.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Qui apparirà l’elenco degli utenti precedentemente invitati a {{productName}} o in stanze separate. Potrai invitare questi utenti a collaborare in qualsiasi momento.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "別室に招待したユーザー" (users invited to separate rooms) is slightly awkward and doesn't perfectly capture the original meaning of 'or separate rooms'. It implies invitation to a different physical room, which might not be the intended meaning. The original English is more general.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like "または別のグループに招待したユーザー" (users invited to another group) or "または別のスペースに招待したユーザー" (users invited to another space) to better reflect the intended meaning.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "コラボレーションのために招待することができるようになります" (you will be able to invite these users for collaboration) is overly formal and a bit verbose. It's not a natural way to say this in Japanese.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: A more natural phrasing would be "これらのユーザーをいつでもコラボレーションのために招待できます" (you can invite these users for collaboration at any time) or simply "いつでもコラボレーションのために招待できます" (you can invite at any time).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເມື່ອກ່ອນ' (meu khon) which translates to 'previously' is grammatically correct but could be slightly improved for natural flow. It's a little stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing the initial part of the sentence to something like 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທີ່ເຄີຍຖືກເຊີນໄປ...' (phu sai thi kheu thuk chen pai... - users who used to be invited to...)

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "kiedykolwiek zechcesz" is a very literal and slightly awkward translation of "at any time". It sounds overly formal and unnatural in Polish. A more natural translation would be "w dowolnym momencie" or "zawsze, gdy chcesz".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: W każdej chwili lub zawsze, gdy chcesz.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්' (parishreelakayin) is a less common and potentially less clear term for 'users'. A more common and accessible term would be preferable.
The sentence structure 'ඔබට ඕනෑම විටෙක සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට මෙම පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට ආරාධනා කිරීමට හැකිය' is slightly awkward. It could be improved for better flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace with: 'ඔබට ඕනෑම විටෙක මෙම පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ට සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කල හැකිය.' or 'ඕනෑම විටෙක ඔබට මෙම පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ව සහයෝගයෙන් වැඩ කිරීමට ආරාධනා කල හැකිය.'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "at any time" is not perfectly captured by "в будь-який час". While understandable, a more natural and accurate translation might emphasize immediacy or flexibility. "За потреби" or "коли вам потрібно" could be considered.
